translation_info.title: KAKAIYARI NIUKIEYA XAPAYARI WIXARIKAKI
translation_info.license: Creative Commons License: Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)

verses.text: Ne Papuru, Kakaiyari kemitinakeki nekananayexeiyarieni, ni'ariekame nemayaniki Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsiemieme[cite: 3139]. Kakaiyari teiterimama nekanixewairitiaka 'Epetsutsie xemitama yuri xemite'erie Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsie[cite: 3140].

Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari, meta Ketsutsi Kiritsitu miti'aitame 'aixia mekete'u'iyarini xehetsiemieme, mekexepitiaka yu'iyaritsie xemika'uximatiariekaki[cite: 3141, 3142, 3143]. 'Aixia 'aneneme ketemite'upitiarie Kiritsitu hetsie tetewiyati, 'iyaritsie mieme[cite: 3144].

'Aixia ketikuxaxatsiwani Kakaiyari, kemi'ane Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu mu'ukiyarieya[cite: 3145]. Kiritsitu hetsie tetewiyakaku miki 'aixia kataniu- yurieni tatsi'upitiaka naime 'aixia mi'ane 'iyaritsie mieme, meta muyuawi hetsiemieme[cite: 3145].
Kwie kanetiariewekaku 'akuxi, Kiritsitu ha'eriwati 'aixia kataniuyurieni tatsi'anayexeiyaka hetsiena mieme temipatsiekaki, tahetsie mikarahiiwaniki tatsixeiyakaku[cite: 3146, 3147].
Tasinaki'erieti, meripaiti yatiyihiaweka, yuniwema pitatsi'ayeitia, Ketsutsi Kiritsitu hetsiemieme[cite: 3148]. Kemiki mitatsiyurimikikai[cite: 3148].
Kataniupitiani 'aixia temutiyuaneniki hepaitsitana, witsikemitatimikwa[cite: 3153, 3154, 3155, 3156]. Mipai pitatiumi, kemi'ane minaki'eriwatsie temitewiyaki[cite: 3157, 3158, 3159, 3160].

Miki mutayeuriyaki, tekaniuxinarieni[cite: 3163, 3164]. Kiritsitu hetsiena tetewiyati xuriyaya tekaniuxinarieni[cite: 3166, 3167, 3168]. Tekateneuyehiwiyarieni kaketemite'uyuri[cite: 3169, 3165]. Mipai katatineuyehiwirieni kwinimieme 'aixia tiuka'iyariti[cite: 3170].
Tinimiiriyakaitini tita mitiyurienekai tahetsiemieme 'aixia tiuka'iyariti[cite: 3171]. Naimeki temaiwawemete katanayeitiani katanipitiaka 'aixia temiteku'eriwaniki naime hepaitsita[cite: 3171].
Katatinihekiatsitiaka tita mitinake[cite: 3172]. Meripai pikatimatsiikikai tita mitinake, peru Kiritsitu ha'eriwati yapitiyuwairiya mitatihekiatsitianiki[cite: 3172].
Mipai katinaye'atianikekaitini kepauka tukari 'aixia mi'ane maye'anikekai, nitaxewiriyakekaitini naime Kiritsitu hetsie tiwiyakame, naime taheima mieme kwiepa mieme[cite: 3173].

Miki meta, mikitsie tetewiyati tekananayex- eiyarieni[cite: 3174]. Mipai tepite'ukayatsarie teiterimama temakineki, mipai katiniyuriemikikaitini meripai, mipai tiniyikihiawekaitini kemi'ane naime mitikuyuitiwa yatiyikihiaweti kemitinake[cite: 3174].
Tame meri yuri temite'uta'eri Kiritsitu hetsie, tame tekananayexeiyarieni 'aixia temutiyuaneniki 'iya hepaitsita witsikemi'ane[cite: 3175].

Xemeta xekani'enieni niuki yuri maine, miki niuki kexemitetawikweitsitiarieni maine[cite: 3176]. Hetsiena yuri xeteniuta'erieni[cite: 3176]. 'Ana xepu'iniaritiarie, 'Iyari Mitiyupataki xeputseyumarie[cite: 3176]. Kakaiyari mipai putayi xemeixeiyanikekaiki miki 'Iyari[cite: 3180].

mikita kanihikitini tita temitepitiarie hiki mieme, mimatsiikiniki tita tahetsie mitinake kepauka mitatsitaxina yuteiterima[cite: 3181]. 'Ana 'aixia tekaniutiyuanekuni 'iya hepaitsita witsikemi'ane[cite: 3181].
'Ayumieme ne neretimaika yuri kexemite'erie Ti'aitame Ketsutsi hetsie, ne'u'enaka kexemitewanaki'erie yunaime Kakaiyari teiterimama[cite: 3185, 3186, 3187, 3188, 3189, 3190, 3191],
nepikatihayewa pamipariyutsi ne'ipitiati Kakaiyari xehetsiemieme[cite: 3192, 3193]. Nenenenewieti nepehiawe xehetsiemieme[cite: 3195],

mipai netinenenewieti, Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu Kakaiyarieya, ta'ukiyari witsimi'ane, mipai ketixepitiaka yu'iyaritsie xemitemaiwaweniki, naiti mitimatsiikiniki xehetsiemieme xe'imaikaku[cite: 3196].

Mipaita nepitiyunenewie, yu'iyaritsie xeke'uhekiariwiyarieni xe'imaiti temitekwewie tita tatsi'uta'inieku, miki xemitemaikaki tita mitatipitiani, waikawa kemitipaime witsikemiti'ane tita tahetsie mitinake Kakaiyari teiterimama wahamatia[cite: 3198, 3199, 3200, 3201, 3202],
xemitemaikaki meta mariwemeki kemititirikaiye tatsiparewienike tame yuri temite'erie[cite: 3203]. Yitirikariyaki mipai kaniyiweni, yemeki tirikaiyeti[cite: 3203].
yaxeikia kemitiuyuri Kiritsitu hetsiemieme 'enukuketiati mikite watsata, yutserieta 'ikayeti muyuawitsie[cite: 3204].

Mana yunaime waheima nakaweni tewa, miki memite'aita heitserie memexeiya memitirikawi memiwa'ukiyarima, tsepa kememitetetewa, yunaime waheima nakaweni, hiki miemete waheima, tukari 'umamietsie miemete waheima[cite: 3205, 3209].
Mipaita pitiuyuri naime ra'iwati mitita'aitaki, mipai tinipitiani naime mitikuyuitianiki memiyutixexeiriwa wahetsiemieme, tewi mu'uya mikuyuitiwa hepai yuwaiyari[cite: 3210].
Memiyutixexeiriwa waiyarieya mekanihikitini, miki mekaniutihiniyarieni, wahiniyakaku kemi'ane nai mitihiniya naitsarie[cite: 3211].
Xemeta hepaina kanixe'anutanieritiani tsepa xemimikitetikai xeheuyexirieti 'axaxeteyurieti[cite: 3214].

'Anapaiti xeniu'uwakaitini mipai xeteyurieti kememiteyurie hiki miemete kwiepa memitama, kemitiyuriene kemi'ane mitiwa'aitia miki heitserie memexeiya 'ekapa memanukuneniere[cite: 3215, 3216]. Kemitiyuriene miki kakaiyari hiki miwakuyuitiwa miki memikayuwairiya yamemitekahuniki, mipai xekateniyuriekaitini xeme[cite: 3216].

Miki tewaniti 'anapai tekaniu'uwakaitini tanaiti ketemite'ukahiwe'eriekai waitsie tetewiyati[cite: 3217]. Kemitinakekai tawaiyari, ketemitetakihiawekai, yatekateniyuriekaitini[cite: 3217]. Ketemi'anenekai takimana, tahetsie katini- nakekekaitini temihekarieniki, yaxeikia hipame wahepai[cite: 3218].
Matsi Kakaiyari waikawa katani- naki'eriekaitini, niyutatuakaitini tatsinenimayati[cite: 3222].
'Ayumieme tsepa temimikitetikai teheuyexirieti, miki Kiritsitu mame katananutanieritiani[cite: 3223]. 'Aixia mitiuka'iyariki xeputawikweitsitiarie[cite: 3223].
Hamatiana katananuku'uitiani, kataniukayatsa muyuawitsie Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsie tetewiyakaku[cite: 3224].

Tukari 'umamietsie mitihekiataniki kemitiyutatua 'aixia tiuka'iyariti, 'ayumieme mipai katiniuyurieni[cite: 3225]. Yatinihekiatamikikaitini 'aixia tatsiyurieneti Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsie temitewiyaki[cite: 3225].

Mipai 'aixia mitiuka'iyariki, 'ayumieme xeputawikweitsitiarie yuri xete'erieti[cite: 3226, 3227]. Peru kexemite'utawikweitsitiarie, yikimana xepika'utawikweitsitiarie[cite: 3228]. Kakaiyari pita yakatinixe'upitiani[cite: 3231, 3229, 3230].
Tixaiti xemite'uyuriki xepika'utawikweitsitiarie[cite: 3232]. 'Ipai nepaine kapa xewiti naki'akaki yikimana[cite: 3232].
Miki 'iwewarimama tekanihikitini[cite: 3233]. Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsie tetewiyati tekaniunetiarieni 'aixia temiteyuriekaki, Kakaiyari meripaiti kemitikaye mipai teteyurieti temu'uwaniki[cite: 3233].

'Ayumieme xeketena'eriwani xeme 'anapai kexemi'anenekai[cite: 3235, 3236]. Xepikahuriyutsixitikai herie kexemi'anenekai[cite: 3238, 3237]. Miki 'iniatsiekate memite'uyuteriwa, miki mekanixetawe'eriekaitini mipai me'utiyuati kename xeme wahepai xeka'iniatsiewawe, miki yuwaiyaritsie memeixeiyakaiki huriyutsixi wa'iniari, mamaki kemitiuxiteke[cite: 3241, 3242, 3243, 3239, 3240, 3244, 3247].

'Anapai xepikaheixeiyakai Kiritsitu[cite: 3249, 3251]. Xepiyupatakai 'ixaheritsixi teiteriyari wahepai heitserie xekahexeiyati[cite: 3250, 3252]. Kiekame heitserie kemirexeiya, xeme xaitsie miemete wahepai xepi'anenekai[cite: 3253]. 'Atsixepikatemaikai tiratute hepaitsita, Kakaiyari kemainekai kemitiwapitianikekai[cite: 3253]. Tixai xepikatekwewiekai, Kakaiyari xepikahexeiyakai 'ena kwiepa[cite: 3254].
Hikirixia Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsie xetewiyati 'ahura xekanakine xeme tewa xemu'uwakai 'ana, Kiritsitu xuriyaya mutayeuriki[cite: 3255].

Miki kanihikitini kemi'ane mitatsipitia 'aixia temitetaxeiyaniki[cite: 3256]. Huriyutsixi, meta memikahuriyutsixi, niwarutaxewiriya yunaime[cite: 3256]. Kepauka temataka'uniekai, tetsariya warita temuti'uka hepai tekani'anenekaitini, peru Kiritsitu nenuta'una tetsariya[cite: 3257].

Ketemite'ataka'uniekai, kataniunitiani kepauka mumierie[cite: 3258, 3259]. 'Iniari niukiyari kananuyeitiani ketemite'aitiariekai xexuime 'aitsikaki[cite: 3260]. Mipai katiniuyurieni nuiwari yiki mi'ane minetianiki, tatsi'utaxewiriyaka tame meta xeme hetsiena tetewiyakaku, kemitatipitia 'aixia temitetaxeiyaniki[cite: 3260].
Mipai katiniuyurieni meta Kakaiyari hamatia 'aixia temitetaxeiyaniki xeiwaiyari tehikititi[cite: 3261]. Mipai katinaye'atiani kuruxitsie 'umierieka, tatsinitiati temataka'uniekaiki[cite: 3261].

'Ana nuaka niuki 'aixia manuyine kanixekuxaxatiwakaitini, xeme tewapai xemu'uwakai 'aixia kexemitexeiyarie tameta 'ahurawa temu'uwakai katanikuxaxatiwakaitini 'aixia ketemitexeiyarie[cite: 3262, 3263].
Mipai mitiuyuriki, tanaiti heitserie tekanexeiyani temaye'axianiki ta'ukiyari hetsia xei'iyariyaritsie tetewiyati[cite: 3266].
Hikirixia 'ayumieme xaitsie xepikakiekatari, kikamete xepikahiki[cite: 3267, 3268]. Matsi Kakaiyari teiterimama wahamatia heitserie xepexeiya, Kakaiyari kie xepikiekatari[cite: 3268].

Ni'aritsixi texaxatamete kememitekuxatakai, tetsariya kitia mieme hepai 'aneme mekaniutawewieni[cite: 3269]. Wahetsie xetewiyati xekanakine, kii kemitiwewiwa tetsariya heima[cite: 3269]. Kiritsitu Ketsutsititi kanihikitini tsikurita mieme tete 'aminena[cite: 3270, 3271].
Mikitsie tiwiyati kanixewiriyarieka naiti miwewiya, Ti'aitame hetsie kemitiwiya tuki payeika Kakaiyari hetsiemieme mipatsie[cite: 3272].
Xemeta hetsiena xetewiyati xekaniti'uitiarieximeni xeikiyari xemakineki 'axeikia, Kakaiyari xetaita mayekaniki yu'iyariki[cite: 3273, 3274].
'Ayumieme neri Ti'aitame hetsie nekaniupitiani[cite: 3280]. Ne Papuru nekanihikitini kemi'ane Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsiemieme nemanutahiiya xeme xemikahuriyutsixi xehetsiemieme[cite: 3280].
Xiari xepu'enana kenemitiuhiritiarie, Kakaiyari 'aixia tiuka'iyarikaku[cite: 3282, 3283]. Mipai nepitiupitiarie xehetsiemieme[cite: 3284].

Xepu'enana kemitiuyi kepauka nemitiuta'ikitiarie tita miti'awietsiekai hepaitsita[cite: 3285, 3287, 3288]. Kakaiyari yikimana matsiikime kanayeitiani[cite: 3292]. Mipai ne'utaiti 'etsiwa nepitixe'uta'utiiri[cite: 3292].
Kenemainekai, xe'iteriwati xekaniyiwaweni xemitemaikaki kenemitimaiwe 'iki niuki mi'awietsiekai Kiritsitu mukuxata hepaitsita[cite: 3293].

Meripai teiteri memanutiki wa'utima miemete, 'ana mipai mepikate'ikitiariekai teiteri, hiki matsi ni'ariekate memupatsie, meta Kakaiyari niukametemama, miki mipai mepite'ikitiarie 'Iyari yatiwahekiatiakaku[cite: 3294, 3295].

Mipai mepitehetima, memikahuriyutsixi huriyutsixi wahamatia yaxeikia wahetsie pitinake, xeiwaiyari mepaki huriyutsixi wahamatia, 'axeikia mepeixeiya tita huriyutsixi memite'utahiawarie kename meheixeiyanikekai miki[cite: 3296]. Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsie metewiyati mipai mepu'itiarie niuki 'aixia manuyineki[cite: 3297].
Neri miki niuki hepaitsita nepuhiritiarie Kakaiyari keminetiumi 'aixia tiuka'iyariti, yitirikariyaki keminetiuyuitia[cite: 3298, 3299, 3300].

Meriki tsepa yunaime Kakaiyari teiterimama wahepai nemikamariwe, 'aixia tiuka'iyarikaku mipai nepitiumikie, niuki 'aixia manuyine nemiwakuxaxatiwaniki hipame nuiwarite mipai ne'utaiti, Kiritsitu waikawa kemirexeiya, katiyu'iniatsiniakame[cite: 3301, 3302].

Mipaita nepitiumikie, nemitiwahekiatsitiiyaniki yunaime tita Kakaiyari mitiyurienikekai[cite: 3302]. Mipai pikatimatsiikikai, katini'awietsiekaitini matsi matiaripaiti[cite: 3303]. Kakaiyari naime mutiunetia, miki xeikia mipai katinimaikaitini kemitiyurienikekai, yakatini'awietakaitini[cite: 3303].

matsiikiti mayaniki hiki, memiyutixexeiriwa yametehekiatakaku, miki muyuawitsie memite'aita heitserie memexeiya yamemitehetimaniki, miiremeki kemitimaiwe Kakaiyari, tahetsie yatimatsiikikaku[cite: 3307, 3308, 3309].
Mipai tiyurienike, yapitiyikihiawekai meripaiti, mipaita katinaye'atiani Tati'aitiwame Kiritsitu Ketsutsi yatiyurienekaku[cite: 3310].
Mikitsie tetewiyati heitserie tekanexeiyani temitahiaweki teyutatuati, 'aixia 'iyariki temaye'axianiki hixiena, yuri temite'erieki hetsiena[cite: 3311].
'Ayumieme nepixewawirie ne'uximatiariekaku xemikawairipiekaki xehetsiemieme[cite: 3313, 3314, 3315]. Mipai nemi'itiarieki, 'ayumieme xepaye'axiani witsixe'aneneti xemakineki[cite: 3316].
'Ayumieme nekaniutitunumakeni nenewieri ne'ipitianike Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu 'ukiyarieya[cite: 3318].
Miki meha'eriwati yunaiti nuiwarite yamekatenitetewaka kwiepa memitama meta muyuawitsie memitama[cite: 3319].
Nepinenewiya, miki waikawa kemirexeiya witsiti'aneneme, mixepitianiki yemeki xemitirikariyarieniki yuhetsie 'Iyarieya yatixetirikariyakaku[cite: 3320, 3321, 3322, 3323, 3324],

miki meta, kexepitiaka Kiritsitu xe'iyaritsie miyekaniki yuri xete'eriekaku[cite: 3325]. Xeteyukanaki'erieti xekenetseiriyarieka, kiye kemititse'i hananati, kii kemititse'i tetsariyatsie weti[cite: 3326].

Mipai 'axeikia xeteyukanaki'erieti xekaniyiwawekuni xemitehetimaniki, yunaime Kakaiyari teiterimama wahamatia, kemakuyewa, kemeutatewa, kemeutitewa meta kemeukatewa, Kiritsitu kemitiyukanaki'erie[cite: 3329, 3332, 3333],
xemimaikaki Kiritsitu naki'eriyaya, tsepa tewi mikayiwe yamiretimaniki[cite: 3334, 3335]. Xeke'utihiniyarieni, hepaina xemi'aneneniki, Kakaiyari kemi'ane[cite: 3336, 3337].

Kemi'ane miyiwe matsi kwinimieme mitiyurieneniki tsepa kemititita, tame ketemikate'iwawiriewawe matsi ketemikateta'iyaritiawawe, tirikariyaya kemitatikuyuitiwa[cite: 3338, 3339, 3340, 3341, 3342, 3344],

miki hepaitsita 'aixia meke'utiyuaneni metatsiha'eriwati tame temitatixexeiriwa Kiritsitu Ketsutsi meha'eriwati, yunaiti teiteri mexi me'anutikika tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika[cite: 3345]. Mipai xeikia kani'aneni[cite: 3346].

'Ayumieme neri Ti'aitame hetsie netiwiyati nekananutahiiyaka, wairiyarika nekanixepitiaka, 'aixia 'anemeki xemu'uwaniki, kemireuyewetse yamitikamieniki kemi'ane muta'inierie kexemite'uta'inierie xeme[cite: 3348].
Tixaiti xekatehikititi xekeneyu'erieka naimeki, xepika'ayu'eririyani, 'axeketeneutewini xekaha'ati, xekeneyunewieka matsi xeyunaki'erieti[cite: 3350, 3351, 3353, 3354].
'Iyari kemitatixewiriya, xekeneyumexiitiaka xemiyuhayewaki xeyuxewiti 'aixia xeteyuxeiyati[cite: 3355].
Xeiwaiyari tekanihikitini, meta 'Iyari kaniyuxewini[cite: 3358, 3359]. Yaxeikia xeme kepauka xemuta'inierie, tita xetekwewieti xemite'aki, mikita kaniyuxewini[cite: 3362, 3363, 3364].
Ti'aitame kaniyuxewini, xeimetsie yuri tekateni'erieka, xeime hetsie tetewiyati tekaniuka'iyarieni[cite: 3365].
Kakaiyari yunaime miwa'ukiyari mikita kaniyuxewini, miki yunaime katiniwa'aitiaka, yunaime kaniwakuyuitiwani, yunaime wahetsie katiniwiyani[cite: 3366].
Matsitsi taxexuiti yatepitemikie ketemite'iniatsiyarie, Kiritsitu kemitatimikwa[cite: 3368, 3369].
'Ayumieme mipai paine 'utiarika: <<Wapaiti 'anutiyaka, me'anutaxiriyakame yumiireme, kaniwarehapani meta teiteri 'imikieri kaniwarumini»[cite: 3371, 3372, 3373, 3374].
(¿Merikite ketita tixata «wapaiti 'anutiyaka» maine, mipai xiari paine, peukayune meri 'emeukatewatsie kwiepa paiti? [cite: 3375]).
Kemi'ane meukayunixi, miki kanihikitinita kemi'ane muyuawi heima manutitia 'ateewa, naime mihiniyaniki)[cite: 3376].
Miki mipai pitiwarumi, hipati ni'ariekate memakineki, hipatita texaxatamete, hipati tehekiatamete, hipatita te'iwiyamete meta te'ikitamete[cite: 3377].
Yakatiniwarumini waraye'atianike yuteiterima yamemite'uximayakaki kememite'uhiritiarie[cite: 3378]. Wakimana Kiritsitu waiyarieya kaniweriyariekamiki[cite: 3379, 3380].

Mipai tekatenipitiarieka mexi te'aye'axiaxime tanaiti temitaxewiniki yuri ketemite'erie Kakaiyari nu'ayatsie, ketemiteheitima[cite: 3384]. Mipai tekatenipitiarieka tewi maye'awe temakineki, temitsetseiyeniki Kiritsitu kemiraye'awe hepai, miki Kiritsitu ta'iniaritikaku[cite: 3385].

'Ana tepitehayewani türi wahepai teyiati[cite: 3386]. Tepikakuyuitiariwani naime 'ikitsikaki, hamewari kemitiuyuane 'ekaki, teiteri kememiteyukwamana, kememiteyu'iyaritia mete'irimati memeuyexirieniki[cite: 3386].
Matsi yuri te'utiyuati tetetakanaki'erieti, tekanitiwerikuni 'iya hepai te'aneneti temakineki naimeki[cite: 3387]. 'Iya kanitamu'utini Kiritsitutiti[cite: 3388].

Tanaiti hetsiena tetewiyati tekanitaweririmeni, tewi waiyarieya yumu'utsie tiwiyati kemitiwere naiti[cite: 3388]. Waiyarieya nawitiarieni kaniutaxewiriyarieni, turuyari 'ixewiriyakaku, yaxeikia tewi waiyarieya kemitiyuweriya yikimana, tameta tetetakanaki'erieti tekanitirikariyarieka waiyarieya tehikititi[cite: 3390, 3391, 3392, 3393]. Yiki 'anemeki kemirayeniereni Kiritsitu hetsie tiwiyati[cite: 3394].
'Ayumieme 'ipai nepaine, Ti'aitame hetsie netiwiyati 'ipai nepitihekiata[cite: 3395]. Xepika'u'uwani hipati kememiyia memikatateiterima[cite: 3395]. Yaki xeikia mekateniku'eriwani miki[cite: 3396],
mekaniuyiriyarieni kememiteyumate yu'iyaritsie, heitserie mepikahexeiya Kakaiyari tukari miwapitianiki, miki 'atsimemikatemateki wa'iyari mitsetse'iki[cite: 3397, 3400, 3401].

Kememi'anene, miki yu'iyaritsie mekaniximimianini, mepiyuwairiya memirukuyatiweniki kememiteyukahiwe'erie, naime tita mikati'itiya yamemiteyuriekaki yuhetsiemieme e metehiwe'erieti[cite: 3402, 3403, 3404, 3405, 3406].
Peru xeme mipai xepikate'u'ikitiarie Kiritsitu hepaitsita[cite: 3407].
Xiari hepaitsitana xepi'enana, hetsiena xetewiyati xepite'uta'ikitiarie tita yuri miraine, Ketsutsi hetsie kemitimatsiiki[cite: 3408].

'Ayumieme kexemite'u'ikitiarie, xekenanutihina tita mitiye'i, xeketeneuhayewa kexemiyiakai meripaiti[cite: 3409]. Kemi'ane mipai mitiyuriene, miki kanitapinirimeni 'irimari kemitihiwe'eritia[cite: 3409].
Xehekwariyarieti xekenakini, yu'iyaritsie 'aixia xeteyikihiaweti[cite: 3410].

Xekenanakatiki tita 'aixia miti'ane, tita mitiunetiarie Kakaiyari hepai 'aneti 'aneti[cite: 3411]. Miki tita yuri mirainetsie memimiemete wahepai heitseriemeki yaxeketenekahuni, Kakaiyari xe'ayexeiyati xekeneyiaka[cite: 3412].
'Ayumieme xeketeneuhayewa xete'itawati, yuxexuiti yuri xeketeneyutahiawi, tanaiti 'axeikia temitaxewiniki xeiwaiyaritsie temimiemeki[cite: 3413].
Xika xeha'aka, perutsi 'axaxepikateyurieni, xepika'ipitiaka xeitukari xemiha'akaki[cite: 3414].
Meta, Kauyumarie xepikapitiaka xehetsie muyuhayewaniki[cite: 3415].
Kemi'ane mitinawayakai ketiuhayewa tinawaneti, ketikumaiwani matsi yumamaki 'aixia tiyurieneti, mirexeiyaniki miki memiteheuyehiwa mitiwayetuiriwaniki[cite: 3415, 3417, 3420, 3421].

Niuki 'axamaniyine xika xeteta 'atineni, 'aixia pikayini, matsi pita xika 'aixia 'anemeki xe'utiniukani watseiriyati kemi'ane meiyehiwa, mipai xekeneutiyuaneni pita, 'aixia xemiwayurieniki 'enakaremete[cite: 3422].
Xepika'ihiweritiaka Kakaiyari 'Iyarieya Mitiyupata[cite: 3423]. Miki kanixetseyutini kimana xemu'iniatsie mexi tukari ka'aye'awe kepauka temixinarieni[cite: 3423, 3424].
Xeketeneuhayewa xeteyuka'uxiwe'erieti xehayutsiiriyati xeyuhaxiawiyati[cite: 3425, 3426, 3428, 3429]. Miki naiti ketixani'eriwani xehetsia, meta naiti 'axamiti'ane[cite: 3430, 3431].
'Aixia xete'u'iyariti xekenakini, xekeneyunenimayaka, xeketeneuyuyehiwirieka, xeme Kakaiyari kemitixeheuyehiwiri Kiritsitu hetsie xetewiyakaku[cite: 3432, 3433].
'Ayumieme Kakaiyari xe'iketi xekenakini[cite: 3436]. Kemi'ane mixenaki'erie niwemama wahepai xekeneyiaka[cite: 3437].
Xeteyukanaki'erieti xekeneu'uwani, yaxeikia Kiritsitu kemitatinaki'erie, miyuyetua tahetsiemieme mimierieniki[cite: 3437]. Mawarititi kaniyuyetuani 'ixatiati Kakaiyari, 'inaki'atsitiati[cite: 3437].

Hipati mekaniwakumaiwani kemi'ane mikawa'iya mikawakina, mepika'itiyatika, yuhetsiemieme mekatenihiwe'erieka naime[cite: 3438]. Matsi kememiteyurie, miki xepikakuxatani xeme, meuyewetseki miki Kakaiyari hetsiemieme mipai memikateyuriekaki[cite: 3438, 3442].

Hipati mipai mekateniyurieka, ketemitetewiniarienikekai xika wahepai teteyuriekake[cite: 3444]. Yaki xeikia mekaniutiyuaneni, mekaniyunanaimaka 'axami'aneki[cite: 3444]. 'Aixia pika'ane mipai xemiteyuriekaki, matsi peuyewetse Kakaiyari pamipariyutsi xemipitiakaki[cite: 3445].

Teiteri mepiwakumaiwa kemi'ane mikawa'iya mikawakina, mepika'itiyatika, naime mepitehiwe'erie yuhetsiemieme[cite: 3446]. Tita mitihiwe'erie, miki payexeiya yukakaiyaritime[cite: 3446]. 'Ipai xeketenemaika, yunaiti miya memiteyurie, miki wahetsie pikatinake memaye'axianiki Kiritsitu tiwa'aitiwame mayaniki, meta Kakaiyari[cite: 3447].
Nikati xewiti tixe'u'itaiya 'eka niuki wewieti[cite: 3448]. Miya memiteyurieki, 'ayumieme Kakaiyari piwaheka miki memikayuwairiya yamemitekahuniki[cite: 3448].
Merikite, xepikayuxewiriyani wahamatia kememiteyurie[cite: 3449].
Meripaiti yiwipa xepimiemetetikai, hikiri matsi hekiaripa miemete xekanakine Ti'aitame hetsie xetewiyati[cite: 3450]. Hekiaripa miemete wahepai xekeneyiaka[cite: 3450].

(Hekiariya kemitixuaweriya, 'ipai katiniyurienemiki tewi[cite: 3452, 3455]. Naimeki 'aixia katiniyurienemiki, heitseriemeki yakatinikamiemiki, yuri kaniutainemiki)[cite: 3456, 3457, 3458, 3459, 3460, 3461].
Xekeneyi'iwiya yaxemitehetimaniki tita Ti'aitame mitinake[cite: 3462, 3463].
Xepikayuxewiriyani miki yiwipa timieme kememiteyurie wahamatia[cite: 3464]. Tixaiti pikatitixuawere kememiteyurie[cite: 3467]. Matsi xekeniwahekiatani kememiteyurie[cite: 3467].
'Awie kememiteyurie miki, putewiuyikire miwakuxataniki[cite: 3468].
Peru miki naiti hekiatsieti, matsiikiti kanayeitiariwani hekiaripa[cite: 3469]. Hekiariya kanihikitini tita matsiikime mirayeitia naime[cite: 3470].
'Ayumieme mipai paine: <<'Eki pemikutsu, kenanutanieri, mikite watsata kenanukukexi, meta Kiritsitu kamanihekiariyamiki»[cite: 3471].
'Ayumieme xekeneyukweriwayurieka 'aixia kexemite'u'uwa[cite: 3472]. 'Atsimemikatemate wahepai xepikayiaka, memitemaiwawe wahepai pita xekeneyiaka[cite: 3472].
'Aixia xekeneyukumexuitiaka xemiteyurieniki, mexi tukari xepitiarie hipati tukari 'axami'aneneki[cite: 3474].
'Ayumieme 'atsimemikatemate wahepai xepikayiaka, matsi pita xekenemaika tita Ti'aitame mitinake[cite: 3475].
Xepikatariwetiweni winuki[cite: 3476]. Mipai tiyurieneti pirukuyaneni xeikia[cite: 3476]. Matsi 'Iyariki pita xekenehipineni[cite: 3477].
Yuxexuiti xekeneyutuikani, niawari hepaitsita meta Kakaiyari kwikarieyaki, kwikari 'Iyaritsie timieme hepaitsita manuyine xekeneutikwika, yu'iyaritsie[cite: 3477, 3478, 3479, 3480].

Yuheyemeki xe'iniawati Ti'aitame naimeki xekenepitiaka Kakaiyari pamipariyutsi mita'ukiyari, Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu hetsia xemimiemeteki[cite: 3481, 3482, 3483, 3484, 3488, 3489, 3490, 3491].
Xeyuxewiti yaxeketenekahuni Kiritsitu xe'ayemakati[cite: 3493, 3494].
'Ukari yaxeketenekahuni xekinama kememaitika, yaxeikia kexemitekahu Ti'aitame ti'aitakaku[cite: 3495, 3496, 3497, 3498].
'Uki 'uka mu'uya kanihikitini, yaxeikiata Kiritsitu memiyutixexeiriwa wamu'u kanihikitini, miki kanihikitini kemi'ane yuwaiyari mutawikweitsitia[cite: 3499].
Memiyutixexeiriwa yamekatenikahuni kemiti'aita Kiritsitu, yaxeikiata 'ukari yameketekahuni kememaitika wakinama naimeki[cite: 3500].
Xeme 'ukitsi xekeniwanaki'erieka yi'iitama, yaxeikia Kiritsitu mitiwanaki'erie memiyutixexeiriwa, miyuyetua mimierieniki wahetsiemieme[cite: 3501, 3502, 3503, 3504].
Yuhetsiemieme miwapataki mipai kaniniuyurieni, wa'itieti haki niukiki[cite: 3505, 3506, 3507, 3508].

Mipai pitiuyuri yikimana, yihixie mekaheuwiwirawime, tsepa tixaiti mipai miwati'uitianiki memiyutixexeiriwa witsime'aneneme, mekaheukuyiyiwime, matsi memipatsiekaki pita wahetsie mikarahiiwaniki[cite: 3510, 3511, 3512, 3513, 3514, 3515, 3516, 3517, 3518].
Yaxeikia kaneuyeweka 'ukitsi memiwanaki'eriekaki yi'iitama, yuwaiyari memitenaki'erie hepai[cite: 3519, 3520, 3521]. Kemi'ane yi'iya minaki'erie, miki kaniyunaki'erieka[cite: 3522, 3523].
Tewi hatsuaku yuwaiyari pika'uxie, matsi piweriya pikemaritia[cite: 3529]. Kiritsitu yaxeikia piwayurie memiyutixexeiriwa[cite: 3527].
waiyarieya temihikiki[cite: 3528]. Waiyarieya 'umeyarieya tepihiki tame[cite: 3528].
Kemaine: «'Ayumieme 'uki kaniyupatamiki, yupaapa yumaama wahetsia kanayeyeimiki, yi'iyatsie pita katiniwiyamiki, memiyuhutakai xeiwaiyari mekanakinikuni meyuxewiti»[cite: 3529].

'Iki niuki matsi kanitirikaiyeni, tsepa hetsiemieme mi'awietsiekai, Kiritsitu memiyutixexeiriwa wahepaitsita nepaine[cite: 3530, 3532, 3533]. Merikite xemeta yuxexuiti yunaiti yi'iitama xekeniwanaki'erieka kexemiteyunaki'erie hepai, meta 'ukari yikinama 'aixia meketewaxeiyani[cite: 3533].
Türi xekeniwa'enieka yupaapama Ti'aitame hetsie xetewiyati, mipai xika xeteyurieka piheitserie[cite: 3536].
<<'Apaapa meta 'amaama keniwareu'enieka -kemaine, miki 'aitsika mexiakame kanihikitini, mipaita paine kename tixaiti tiupitiarieni- [cite: 3537]
mipai petiyurieneti 'aixia pepi'itiarieni 'apepireutere kwiepa, pe'uyeikati»[cite: 3538].
Xemeta xemiwapaapama xepikawahaxiatiaka yutiriyama[cite: 3539]. Matsi xekeniwawaweriyani xe- wakuwayati meta xetewa'ikitiati yamitikamieniki Ti'aitame hetsie tiwiyati[cite: 3539].

Te'uximayatamete, xekeniwa'enieka miki memixekutsiyarima kwiepa, xeheumamati xe'utiyiyiakati, 'aixia 'iyariki xete'uximayati, Kiritsitu hetsiemieme matsi xekateni'uximayakakuni[cite: 3543, 3544, 3545, 3546, 3547, 3548, 3549, 3550, 3551].
Wahixie xeikia xepikate'uximayaka teiteri xewanaki'aritianike, matsi Kiritsitu hetsia miemete te'uximayatamete xemihikiki, yu'iyariki yaxeketeneyurieka tita Kakaiyari mitinake[cite: 3552].
Xeyuwairiyati xeketene'uximayaka, kemi'ane Ti'aitame hetsiemieme miti'uximaya hepai xeyiati, teiteri wahetsiemieme pikatixai[cite: 3553].
Mipai xeketenemaika, yuxexuiti 'aixia kememiteyurie, mipai mekatenipitiariekuni Ti'aitame yatiwapitiakaku, te'uximayatamete memihiki, tsepa memiyuni'a[cite: 3555].

Xemeta, xemiwakutsiyarima, yaxeikia xekeniwayurieka, xeketeneuhayewa xewamariutati[cite: 3556]. Mipai xetemaiti, kemi'ane miwakutsiyari mixekutsiyari xemeta, miki Ti'aitame taheima pakawe, yiki teiteri pikatiwaxeiya[cite: 3556].
'Imatirieka ne'iwama, Ti'aitame hetsie xetewiyati xekenetirikariyarieka, kemi'ane mitirikaiye xetirikariyakaku[cite: 3557, 3558].
Kakaiyari kemitiwa'ixiparatia yukuyaxima, mikiki xekeneyukuha'aritiaka kuyaki, xemiyiwaweniki xemiti'ukaki xekakuyuitiarieti Kauyumarie 'irimarieyatsata[cite: 3559, 3560].

Tameri teiteri tewaraye'unieti tepikatakwitiwe[cite: 3560]. Matsi te'aitamete, heitserie hexeiyamete, miki memite'aita 'ena yiwipa naitsarie kwiepa, 'iyarite memiyukwitiwe tita 'axamiti'anetsie mieme muyuawitsie memuxuawe, miki tewaraye'unieti pita tepitakwitiwe[cite: 3564].

'Ayumieme xekenanu'ii Kakaiyari kuyaximama watepia naime[cite: 3565]. Mikiki xekaniyiwaweni xemeye'uniekaki tsepa tukari 'axami'ane, xekaniyiwawekuni xemiti'uniki xekakuyuitiariwati, naime xe'aye'atiame[cite: 3565, 3566].

'Ayumieme 'axekeneti'uka 'aixia[cite: 3566]. Kuya kemirayuhia, xemeta tita yuri miraine xekenekuxatani[cite: 3566]. Kuya tepia kemiranakatiki yutawie kapa 'u'axieniki, xemeta heitseriemeki yaxeketenekahuni[cite: 3567].
Yukakaitsie kemireukexia, xemeta xekeneyukuha'aritiaka niuki 'aixia manuyinetsie xetewiyati, 'aixia ketemitexeiyarie manuyinetsie[cite: 3568].
Miki meta, 'eyeume kemirakaxu'u kimana miyukunarima, xemeta yuri xeketene'erieka[cite: 3568]. Mipai xepiyiwaweni xemitiniki naime 'axamitiuka'iyari 'iriteya mitaiwawe[cite: 3569].

Kuya yumu'utsie tepia kemiranaketsa, xemeta mipai xeketenemaika, xemutawikweitsitiarieki[cite: 3570]. 'Ixipara kemirakwe'e, Kakaiyari niukieya xehexeiyati xekeneyukwitiweni, 'Iyari kemitiyumiene mikiki[cite: 3570].

Naimeki xekeneyunenewieka xekenewawirieka[cite: 3571]. Yuheyemeki nenewieri xekenepitiaka 'Iyaritsie xetewiyati[cite: 3571]. Mipai xemiteyuriekaki, xekeneyihitiaka, yemeki xepikatehayewani xe'iwawirieti Kakaiyari yunaime teiterimama wahetsiemieme[cite: 3572].
Nehetsiemiemeta xekeneyunenewieka, niuki nemipitiariekaki kepauka nemitaniuni, nenatatuati nemihekiataniki tita miti'awietsiekai niuki 'aixia manuyine hepaitsita[cite: 3576].
Mikitsie mieme nekaniniukametini tsepa tepiaki nemanutahiiya[cite: 3577]. Xekeneyunenewieka neminetatuaniki niukitsie mieme, kemireuyewetse nemitaniuniki[cite: 3577].

Yaxemitemaikaki xemeta kenemiranayemie kenemitiyuriene, naime yakatinixetaxatiamiki Tikiku[cite: 3579]. Miki kanita'iwatini teminaki'erie[cite: 3580]. Tiparewiwame yamitikamie kanihikitini Ti'aitametsie mitiwiya[cite: 3581, 3582, 3583].
'Ayumieme xehetsia nepenuni'ani yaxemitemaikaki ketemite'anayeki, xe'iyari mituikariekaki[cite: 3585, 3586, 3587].

Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari meta Ti'aitame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu mekewapitiaka 'iwamarixi memika'uximatiariekaki yu'iyaritsie [cite: 3588, 3589], meta mekewapitiaka memiyunaki'eriekaki yuri mete'erieti[cite: 3590].
Kakaiyari 'aixia ketiuka'iyarini kemi'ane yuheyemeki Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu meminaki'erie wahetsiemieme[cite: 3591].
